    • registerRegion

      public void registerRegion​(@NonNull @NonNull org.bukkit.World world, @NonNull @NonNull RegionObject regionObject)
      Description copied from interface: RegionRegistry
      Adds a region to the registration of a world (All regions are separated by containers that organize the project hierarchy)
      Specified by:
      registerRegion in interface RegionRegistry
      Parameters:
      world - instance of a valid world, obtained through Bukkit.getWorld(String)
      regionObject - region instance, created using the RegionObject(String, Location, Location) constructor of the class itself

    • getAllRegionsOnLocationNaturally

      public java.util.List<RegionObject> getAllRegionsOnLocationNaturally​(@NonNull @NonNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Description copied from interface: RegionRegistry
      Obtains all regions where the player is located, verified through its current location
      Specified by:
      getAllRegionsOnLocationNaturally in interface RegionRegistry
      Parameters:
      player - instance of a valid Player
      Returns:
      get all the regions that exist in your current location but unlike the RegionRegistry.getAllRegionsOnLocation(Player) method it returns from the smallest to the largest, in its natural order

    • getAllRegionsOnLocation

      public java.util.List<RegionObject> getAllRegionsOnLocation​(@NonNull @NonNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Description copied from interface: RegionRegistry
      Obtains all regions where the player is located, verified through its current location
      Specified by:
      getAllRegionsOnLocation in interface RegionRegistry
      Parameters:
      player - instance of a valid Player
      Returns:
      get all the regions that exist in your current location but unlike the RegionRegistry.getAllRegionsOnLocationNaturally(Player) method it returns from highest to lowest, in reverse order

    • getHighestRegionOnLocation

      public RegionObject getHighestRegionOnLocation​(@NonNull @NonNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Description copied from interface: RegionRegistry
      Obtains the region where the player is located, verified through its current location
      Specified by:
      getHighestRegionOnLocation in interface RegionRegistry
      Parameters:
      player - instance of a valid Player
      Returns:
      a region with higher priority, in reverse order. Ex: [spawn: priority = 10, lobby = priority = 20] will return the lobby for having a higher priority than spawn

    • getHighestRegionOnLocation

      public RegionObject getHighestRegionOnLocation​(@NonNull @NonNull org.bukkit.Location location)
      Description copied from interface: RegionRegistry
      Obtains the region where the player is located, verified through its current location
      Specified by:
      getHighestRegionOnLocation in interface RegionRegistry
      Parameters:
      location - instance of Location
      Returns:
      a region with higher priority, in reverse order. Ex: [spawn: priority = 10, lobby = priority = 20] will return the lobby for having a higher priority than spawn

    • getAllRegionsContainer

      public java.util.Set<RegionObject> getAllRegionsContainer​(@NonNull @NonNull org.bukkit.World world)
      Description copied from interface: RegionRegistry
      Get all container regions in the world
      Specified by:
      getAllRegionsContainer in interface RegionRegistry
      Parameters:
      world - instance of a valid world, obtained through Bukkit.getWorld(String)
      Returns:
      collection with all unique regions (there will be no duplicate regions due to the Set interface
